attributes.action: request that the London Organising Committee of the Olympic Games and Paralympic Games alter the Logo for the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo of the 2012 Olympic Games should represent, or at least inspire images of, London, the United Kingdom and indeed the ancient tradition of the Olympics themselves. Therefore the Prime Minister should request the London Organising Committee to change the logo publicly released on the 4th of June 2007, which is unsuitable for such a renowned competition and gives no pictorial representation whatsoever of the nation in which it is taking place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
